SEARCH
Package ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model

Class Deck<T extends Card>

java.lang.Object
ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model.Deck<T>
Type Parameters:
T - must extend card
public class Deck<T extends Card> extends Object
Represents a deck of cards, with contains visible (face-up) and non-visible (face-down) cards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Construct a deck of cards with nothing inside.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(T card)
    Add a card to the deck (face down).
    void
    drawCards(int count)
    Take cards from non-visible (face-down) cards and put it in the visible (face-up) card list.
    List<T>
    getVisibleCards()
    Obtain all the visible (face-up) cards in this deck.
    void
    shuffle()
    Shuffles the deck.
    Card
    take(T card)
    Take a card from the visible stack of cards.
